tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been her patient for long now. She is very experienced and humane in her approach and treatment. She is thorough and gives individual care. She is an amazing human being. I would definitely, definitely recommend her.

tags: None
review: She is a no non-sense person and doesn't fuss. Is clear about what needs to be done and doesn't waste time beating around the bush. Her style and approach works well for me. She also responds to your queries on Whatsapp, which is helpful. However, on whatsapp her response time is usually a bit high, which is possible if she is busy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife got twins 2 years back now unfortunately my wife got pregnant of 40 days and we planned for abortion first doctor suggested to go for tablets by charging 4000 as package and consultation fee and scanning extra after continuos bleeding for 10 days she is saying need to do operate and will cost 35 k their is no clarity and explanation by doctor 
In normal hospital doctors will give tablets and clean next day itself 
Will never suggest and will never come 
For small cases also ***** ***** *** ***** ****** **** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had walked in for a check-up because PCOS is a very common problem now and I wanted to take precautions. From the moment I sat down with her, she started making rude comments on my weight and even called me obese. I do not have a thin body type but I am definitely far from obese. She just kept talking about my weight *** ******* ** ***** 'It's good to be healthy but not too healthy haha', quoting her. She was unnecessarily rude *** *** *** ***** *** **** ******* ******** ***** * **** ** ******* **** I do not recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She is an amazing doctor.i had so many complications and she was the person who helped me hold beautiful gift from God. She listens with patience and helps navigate the journey of 9 months with care. Puts the patient at ease and always available for any query.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a certain pain that started in the 5th month of pregnancy. The doctor to whom I consulted was on leave and I was unable to connect with her. Fortunately, I was near Old Airport Road that time and I could see Cloudnine Hospitals. I consulted Dr. S. K Sharma and she gave me the injection to lower down the pain and gave certain medicines. I'm thankful to her for making me relieve from this uncertain pain. I would recommend her to all my family and friends.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was very good she  listening to the problem patiently  after starting the medicine  prescribed  by her i find relief to my problems i have been strugling since last 1 year and had visited a renowned  gynecologist in Bangalore's biggest hospital but after visitng the doctor several time and multiple  times i did not see any resolution  to my problems where  as visitng Dr SK SHARMA for the first time itself she understood what was the issue and pit me on medication  which eventually brought relief to my issues.
I recommend  Dr S K Sharma .

tags: None
review: I'm nothing Suresh it's without me or for everyone it willingly be there same Generally if we meet a doctor eventually though you have hell lot of problems you should not feel worried after consulting doctor but I always felt tensed and worried as they aren't show casing small things in a higher node always speaking negative words which I dint like.she will not even remember what she told in the last consultation

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is very good doctor she treated nicely good response I feel happy to consult her over all staff also given good response.

tags: None
review: Awesome Dr with good experience. Bit strict but being too caring n loving is also not good for some patients as they do not take instructions from the dr too seriously.

tags: None
review: Very frank and practical. Really good to talk with. Was able to give a good diagnosis. Very experienced.

tags: None
review: I went there for a second opinion and it was a successful approach indeed. The hospital is well maintained with good accessibility over services. There was just about 45 minutes wait time. I am extremely happy with the entire experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ********* ********* Visited cloudnine hospited b4 5yrs..I delivered boy baby safely under her care... Very happy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
miss her guidance now that I don't need to go...she is a pillar and you can actually feel the strength she gives you which steer you through the toughest times...at least for me it was...and yes she is one of the smartest women you would have met..
The aura is such it keeps you firm...my colleague who visited her says the same

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I went for an abortion paid the consultation fee and met her and all she does was recommended me to another doctor saying she does not like to do abortions. . I already have 2 children and explained to her we don't want to have a 3rd so she says she does not believe in abortions. ** *** ** ********* ** ***** ** ** ***** **** **** ** *** ******* ****** ******** ******* ** ******* **** *** ***** ** **** She is  not a very polite person also. Please do not visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor experience is good. *** **** ******** ** *** ************** Hopefully they have no experience holder *** **** ********* ******** ** *** **** *** ************** For example nobody have knowledge about which test will do fasting and which one will do without fasting. Please improve the staff.
